title: Create Project Timeline from Email
description: An agent must parse an unstructured email from a client and turn it into a structured project timeline.

tasks.description: Analyze the email text to extract key tasks and their deadlines.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies tasks like 'Finish the design by next Friday' and 'Launch the site by the end of the month'.

tasks.description: Format the extracted tasks and dates into a structured list.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a clean, structured list of tasks and deadlines.

tasks.description: Generate a simple timeline visualization based on the list.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a visual timeline of the project.
